name: part_003
file: tmp_【#ホロアースライブ】AZKi × Mori Calliopeプロトライブ同時中継！ [M4_M9F6FsLo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Countdown to the start of the live performance.
Mori Calliope performs 'Dawn Blue' on a futuristic virtual stage.

subtitles.original: 捕まえて ほら
subtitles.english: Catch me, see?

subtitles.original: この瞬間
subtitles.english: This moment

subtitles.original: Take a step
subtitles.english: Take a step

subtitles.original: A world of our fiction awaits
subtitles.english: A world of our fiction awaits

subtitles.original: Let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: Dawn Blue
subtitles.english: Dawn Blue

subtitles.original: ずっと同じ毎日に迷い込んでも
subtitles.english: Even if I get lost in the same daily routine

subtitles.original: 気付かないフリをしてたんだ
subtitles.english: I was pretending not to notice

subtitles.original: ほんのちょっとの勇気がまだ出せなくて
subtitles.english: I still couldn't find just a little bit of courage

subtitles.original: 紛れ込む宇宙(そら)で彷徨っていた
subtitles.english: I was wandering in the blending sky

subtitles.original: 夜空に浮かぶ星に願いをかけるんだ
subtitles.english: I make a wish on a star floating in the night sky

subtitles.original: I hope 抱いてる夢を絶対諦めたくない
subtitles.english: I hope... I never want to give up on the dream I hold

subtitles.original: 走り出すから
subtitles.english: Because I'm starting to run

subtitles.original: 追いかけて 今 あの瞬間
subtitles.english: Chase it, now, that moment

subtitles.original: Take a step
subtitles.english: Take a step

subtitles.original: 見たことのないストーリー 進んでいくんだ
subtitles.english: I'm moving forward into a story I've never seen

subtitles.original: いつの日か描いた 世界へ辿り着けるように
subtitles.english: So that I can reach the world I once envisioned

subtitles.original: Let go of the past that's already gone, tomorrow's rolling in
subtitles.english: Let go of the past that's already gone, tomorrow's rolling in

subtitles.original: Is it the world we know or the dream we sought so long?
subtitles.english: Is it the world we know or the dream we sought so long?

subtitles.original: もっと誰でもない自分になりたいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to become a self that is like no one else

subtitles.original: 新しい風が心を揺らした
subtitles.english: A new wind shook my heart

subtitles.original: It takes something to believe
subtitles.english: It takes something to believe

subtitles.original: The wish we were promised will really come to life
subtitles.english: The wish we were promised will really come to life

subtitles.original: And so, if this is how our story goes
subtitles.english: And so, if this is how our story goes

subtitles.original: Find that strength inside and remember what we've got
subtitles.english: Find that strength inside and remember what we've got

subtitles.original: You took my hand and you said...
subtitles.english: You took my hand and you said...

subtitles.original: 捕まえて ほら
subtitles.english: Catch me, see?

subtitles.original: この瞬間
subtitles.english: This moment

subtitles.original: Take a step
subtitles.english: Take a step

subtitles.original: さあ 惑わずに 踏み出して 恐れずに行こう
subtitles.english: Come, don't be confused, step out, let's go without fear

subtitles.original: いつの日か描いた まだ見ぬ世界へ辿り着けるように
subtitles.english: So that I can reach the yet-unseen world I once envisioned

subtitles.original: 夜明けに咲いた月が
subtitles.english: The moon that bloomed at dawn

subtitles.original: 眩いブルーの空に溶けていく
subtitles.english: Is melting into the dazzling blue sky

subtitles.original: You and I in the undecided future
subtitles.english: You and I in the undecided future

subtitles.original: Doesn't matter if the final truth hurts
subtitles.english: Doesn't matter if the final truth hurts

subtitles.original: もうすぐ朝が動き出すから
subtitles.english: Because morning is about to start moving

subtitles.original: 抱きしめて 今
subtitles.english: Hold me, now

subtitles.original: この瞬間
subtitles.english: This moment

subtitles.original: Take a step
subtitles.english: Take a step

subtitles.original: 見たことのないストーリー
subtitles.english: A story I've never seen

subtitles.original: I'll be here betting on that fierce heart
subtitles.english: I'll be here betting on that fierce heart

subtitles.original: Somehow
subtitles.english: Somehow

subtitles.original: Through that moment, take a start
subtitles.english: Through that moment, take a start

subtitles.original: It's all for now baby if you take that step
subtitles.english: It's all for now baby if you take that step

subtitles.original: In the darkness you'll find me
subtitles.english: In the darkness you'll find me

subtitles.original: Running by your side until the dawn
subtitles.english: Running by your side until the dawn

subtitles.original: In the end, it's you and me
subtitles.english: In the end, it's you and me
